com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.splash

Interface DynamicSplashListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicSplashActivity

    public interface DynamicSplashListener
    Interface to implement the splash screen and to get various callbacks while showing the splash.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doBehindSplash()
      This method will be called after starting the splash background task.
      int getLayoutRes() 
      long getMinSplashTime() 
      void onPostSplash()
      This method will be called after finishing the splash background task.
      void onPreSplash()
      This method will be called before starting the splash background task.
      void onViewCreated(View view)
      This method will be called just after creating the splash fragment with the supplied layout resource.

    • Method Detail

      • getLayoutRes

        @LayoutRes
int getLayoutRes()
        Returns:
        The splash layout resource.

      • onViewCreated

        void onViewCreated(@NonNull
                   View view)
        This method will be called just after creating the splash fragment with the supplied layout resource. Do any modifications in the splash layout here.
        Parameters:
        view - The view created from the layout resource.

      • getMinSplashTime

        long getMinSplashTime()
        Returns:
        The minimum time in milliseconds for which the splash must be displayed.

      • onPreSplash

        void onPreSplash()
        This method will be called before starting the splash background task.

      • doBehindSplash

        void doBehindSplash()
        This method will be called after starting the splash background task. Do any time taking operation here. Do not perform any UI related operation here, use onPostSplash() here.

      • onPostSplash

        void onPostSplash()
        This method will be called after finishing the splash background task.
